summary: The Ecosystem Architecture blog series explores the idea of embracing fragmented systems in the digital world, inspired by decentralization and regenerative design. By integrating interdisciplinary insights, the series advocates for building vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems that are innovative and forward-looking. This approach mirrors natural processes and aims to foster a healthier and more dynamic digital environment.
excerpt: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
